canonical_explanation.text: We get food from two main sources: plants and animals. Plants give us fruits, vegetables, grains, and pulses. Animals give us milk, eggs, meat, and honey. Food can be divided into different types: fruits like apples and bananas, vegetables like carrots and spinach, grains like rice and wheat, dairy products like milk and cheese, and pulses like dal. Eating different types of food every day keeps us healthy - this is called eating a balanced diet. Some foods we eat raw like fruits and salads, while other foods we cook before eating like rice and vegetables.
rules: Food comes from plants and animals.
Plants give us fruits, vegetables, grains, and pulses.
Animals give us milk, eggs, meat, and honey.
Eating different types of food keeps us healthy.
Raw food is eaten without cooking; cooked food is heated before eating.
Drinking water and eating fruits and vegetables is important.

questions.question_text: Which of these comes from plants?
questions.explanation_correct: An apple is a fruit that comes from a plant. Plants like apple trees give us fruits to eat. The correct answer is C) Apple.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk, eggs, and chicken do not come from plants. Milk comes from cows, eggs come from chickens, and chicken meat comes from the animal. These foods come from animals, not plants. The correct answer is C) Apple, which is a fruit that comes from a plant.

questions.question_text: Which of these comes from animals?
questions.explanation_correct: Milk comes from animals like cows and buffaloes. It is a dairy product that we get from animals, not from plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice, carrots, and bananas come from plants, not animals. Milk is the only option that comes from animals like cows and buffaloes. We get milk, eggs, meat, and honey from animals.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a fruit?
questions.explanation_correct: Mango is a fruit because it grows on trees and has seeds inside. Fruits are the sweet and juicy parts of plants that we eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Potato is a vegetable, not a fruit. Vegetables grow underground or on plants, but do not have seeds inside like fruits do. Rice is a grain, and dal is a type of pulse. Only mango is a fruit among these options.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a vegetable?
questions.explanation_correct: Spinach is a vegetable because it is a green, leafy plant that we eat. Vegetables are foods that come from plants, like carrots, tomatoes, and broccoli.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apples are fruits, not vegetables. Milk is a dairy product, not a vegetable. Wheat is a grain, not a vegetable. Vegetables are plant-based foods that are not sweet like fruits, and not made from animal products like dairy or meat.

questions.question_text: Which animal gives us eggs?
questions.explanation_correct: The hen is the animal that gives us eggs. Hens lay eggs which we can collect and eat. Cows, dogs, and cats do not lay eggs, so they are not the correct answer.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cows, dogs, and cats do not lay eggs. Only hens lay eggs that we can collect and eat. Hens are the animals that give us eggs, so option C is the correct answer.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a grain?
questions.explanation_correct: Rice is a grain, which means it comes from the seed part of a plant. Grains like rice, wheat, and oats are foods that come from plants and are an important part of a healthy diet.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carrot is a vegetable, banana is a fruit, and milk is a dairy product. These are not grains. Grains are the edible seeds of certain plants, and rice is a common grain that we eat.

questions.question_text: Honey comes from:
questions.explanation_correct: Honey is a sweet liquid made by bees from the nectar of flowers. Bees collect the nectar, bring it back to their hive, and make it into honey. This is why the correct answer is B) Bees.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Honey does not come from cows, hens, or plants. Cows give us milk, and hens give us eggs. Plants give us fruits, vegetables, grains, and other foods, but not honey. The only correct answer is that honey comes from bees.

questions.question_text: Which animal gives us milk?
questions.explanation_correct: Cows give us milk, which we can use to make other dairy products like cheese and butter. Cows are one of the main animals that provide us with milk, which is an important part of a healthy diet.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Hens, fish, and parrots do not give us milk. Only cows and some other animals like buffaloes and goats give us milk that we can drink or use to make other dairy products. Milk is a very important food that helps us grow strong and healthy.

questions.question_text: Which of these do we eat raw?
questions.explanation_correct: Apples are a type of fruit that we can eat raw, without cooking. Fruits are usually eaten without any cooking or preparation, unlike foods like rice and roti that need to be cooked before we eat them.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice and roti are foods that we need to cook before eating. They are not eaten raw like fruits and vegetables. Dal is a type of pulses that is usually cooked with spices and seasonings before we eat it.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a dairy product?
questions.explanation_correct: Cheese is a dairy product because it is made from milk. Milk comes from animals like cows, goats, and buffaloes. So cheese is a food that comes from animals.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Bread is made from grains like wheat, which come from plants. Rice and dal are also plant-based foods. Cheese, on the other hand, is a dairy product that comes from animal milk. Dairy products like cheese, milk, and yogurt are different from plant-based foods.

questions.question_text: Which of these needs to be cooked before eating?
questions.explanation_correct: Rice needs to be cooked before eating. Fruits like banana and grapes can be eaten raw, but rice needs to be cooked to make it soft and easy to eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Bananas, apples, and grapes are all fruits that can be eaten raw without cooking. However, rice is a grain that needs to be cooked in water before eating. Cooking rice makes it soft and tasty to eat.

questions.question_text: Which of these is a pulse?
questions.explanation_correct: Dal is a type of pulse, which is a food that comes from plants. Pulses are an important part of a healthy diet and provide us with protein, fiber, and other nutrients.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice and wheat are grains, not pulses. Milk is a dairy product, not a pulse. Dal, which is a type of lentil, is the correct answer as it is a pulse that comes from plants.

questions.question_text: Ravi eats only rice every day. Is this healthy?

options.text: No, he should eat different types of food
No, he should eat only fruits

questions.explanation_correct: No, Ravi should not eat only rice every day. Eating only one type of food is not healthy. We need to eat different types of foods like fruits, vegetables, grains, and dairy to get all the nutrients our body needs to grow and stay strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating only rice every day is not healthy. Our body needs different types of foods to get all the nutrients we need. Rice alone does not provide all the vitamins, minerals, and other things our body needs. Ravi should eat a variety of foods like fruits, vegetables, grains, and dairy to have a balanced and healthy diet.

questions.question_text: Why should we eat fruits and vegetables?
questions.explanation_correct: Fruits and vegetables are good for our health because they have lots of vitamins, minerals, and fiber that our body needs to grow strong and stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Fruits and vegetables are not just colorful, they are also full of important nutrients that keep our body working well. They are not expensive and easy to grow, but the most important reason to eat them is that they are good for our health.

questions.question_text: Butter is made from milk. Where does butter come from?
questions.explanation_correct: Butter is made from milk, which comes from animals like cows and buffaloes. So the correct answer is B) Animals.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Butter does not come from plants, rocks, or water. Butter is made by churning or processing milk from animals like cows and buffaloes. So the correct answer is B) Animals.

questions.question_text: Salad is made of raw vegetables. Should we wash vegetables before making salad?

options.text: Yes, to remove dirt and germs

questions.explanation_correct: Yes, we should always wash vegetables before making salad. Vegetables can have dirt and germs on them, so washing them removes these and keeps us healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: No, vegetables are not already clean. Even if they look clean, they can have small bits of dirt or germs on them that we cannot see. Washing the vegetables is important to remove these and make the salad safe to eat.

questions.question_text: Why do we cook some foods?

options.text: To make them safe, tasty, and easy to eat

questions.explanation_correct: We cook some foods to make them safe, tasty, and easy to eat. Cooking helps kill germs, make the food soft and flavourful, and easier for us to chew and digest.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We do not cook food just to make it look nice. Cooking is important to make the food safe for us to eat by killing any germs or bacteria. It also makes the food taste better and become soft and easy to chew. The correct reason is to make the food safe, tasty, and easy to eat.

questions.question_text: Which food gives us energy to play and study?
questions.explanation_correct: The correct answer is B) Rice, roti, fruits, and vegetables. These foods give us energy to play and study because they contain carbohydrates, vitamins, and minerals that our body needs to function properly and stay active.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect answers are not the best sources of energy. A) Water is important for our body but it does not provide energy. C) Sweets and D) ice cream have a lot of sugar, which can give a quick burst of energy but then make us feel tired soon after. To have the energy to play and study, we need to eat a variety of healthy foods like rice, roti, fruits, and vegetables.

questions.question_text: Meera loves chips and candies. Should she eat only these?

options.text: No, she should eat healthy food too
Yes, chips are made from potatoes

questions.explanation_correct: Meera should not eat only chips and candies because they are not healthy foods. She needs to eat a variety of healthy foods like fruits, vegetables, grains, and dairy to grow strong and stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Chips and candies may taste good, but they do not have all the nutrients Meera's body needs to be healthy. While candies can give you energy, they also have a lot of sugar which is not good for you. Chips are made from potatoes, but they are fried in oil which makes them unhealthy. Meera should eat a mix of healthy and tasty foods to stay strong and energetic.

questions.question_text: We eat tomato in salad and also in curry. Which way is raw?
questions.explanation_correct: Tomato in salad is eaten raw, while tomato in curry is cooked. So the correct answer is B) In salad.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Tomato in curry is cooked, not raw. Both tomato in salad and tomato in curry cannot be raw, so the correct answer is not C) Both are raw. The correct answer is B) In salad, because tomato in salad is the only way it is eaten raw.

questions.question_text: Which drink comes from plants?
questions.explanation_correct: Fruit juice comes from fruits, which are plants. Milk, buttermilk, and curd come from animals like cows and buffaloes, not from plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk, buttermilk, and curd all come from animals like cows and buffaloes, not from plants. Fruit juice, on the other hand, is made from fruits which are plants. So the correct answer is fruit juice, because it comes from plants.

questions.question_text: Wheat grows on a plant. Wheat is used to make:
questions.explanation_correct: Wheat is a type of grain that grows on plants. Wheat is used to make roti and bread, which are common foods that people eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Wheat is not used to make milk, eggs, or butter. These foods come from animals, not plants. Wheat is a grain that is used to make foods like roti and bread.

questions.question_text: Priya's lunch has rice, dal, vegetables, and curd. She is eating:
questions.explanation_correct: Priya's lunch has both plant-based foods like rice, vegetables, and dal, as well as animal-based foods like curd. This means her meal has a combination of both plant and animal sources, making it a balanced diet.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Priya's lunch is not made up of only plant-based foods or only animal-based foods. It contains a mix of both, such as rice and vegetables from plants, and curd from animals. Eating a variety of foods from both sources is important for a healthy diet.

questions.question_text: Match: Apple is to fruit as spinach is to:
questions.explanation_correct: Spinach is a vegetable, just like an apple is a fruit. Both spinach and apples are plant-based foods that we eat to stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Grains like rice and wheat are used to make foods like bread and pasta. Dairy products come from animals, like milk and cheese. Pulses are a type of bean, like lentils or chickpeas. Spinach is a vegetable, just like an apple is a fruit, so the correct answer is B) Vegetable.

questions.question_text: Which of these is NOT a fruit?
questions.explanation_correct: A potato is not a fruit. Fruits are usually sweet and come from plants, like oranges, bananas, and apples. Potatoes are vegetables that grow underground and are not sweet like fruits.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Potatoes are vegetables, not fruits. Fruits grow on plants and are usually sweet, like oranges, bananas, and apples. Vegetables can grow underground, like potatoes, or on the plant, like carrots and spinach. Potatoes are not sweet like fruits and should not be confused with fruits.

questions.question_text: Curd is made from:
questions.explanation_correct: Curd is made from milk. Milk is a dairy product that comes from animals like cows and buffaloes. When milk is fermented, it turns into curd.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Curd is not made from water, juice, or eggs. Curd is a dairy product made by fermenting milk. This changes the milk into a thick, creamy food we call curd or yogurt.

questions.question_text: Why should we drink water every day?
questions.explanation_correct: We should drink water every day because it keeps our body healthy. Water is very important for our body to function properly. It helps us digest food, carry nutrients to different parts of our body, and remove waste from our body.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not drink water just because it has a nice color or because we have a water bottle. Drinking water is important to keep our body healthy and working well. Water helps our body in many ways, like helping us digest food and removing waste from our body.

questions.question_text: Which of these grows underground?
questions.explanation_correct: Carrots grow underground in the soil, so the correct answer is B) Carrot.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apples, mangoes, and wheat do not grow underground. Apples and mangoes grow on trees, and wheat grows above the ground as a tall plant. Only carrots grow underground, so B) Carrot is the correct answer.

questions.question_text: We should eat ___ types of food to stay healthy.
questions.explanation_correct: Eating different types of food, like fruits, vegetables, grains, and dairy products, is important to stay healthy. This is called a balanced diet. Eating only one or two types of food is not good for our health.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not eat only one or two types of food. That would not give us all the nutrients we need to stay healthy. We also should not just eat sweet foods, as that would not be a balanced diet. The best way to stay healthy is to eat a variety of different foods every day.

questions.question_text: Roti is cooked and apple is eaten raw. What is the difference?

options.text: Roti needs to be heated, apple does not

questions.explanation_correct: The difference is that roti needs to be heated or cooked before you can eat it, while an apple can be eaten raw without any cooking. Cooking makes some foods easier to digest and more tasty.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Option A is incorrect because being cooked or raw does not make a food healthier. Option C is incorrect because the size of the food does not matter - the important thing is whether it needs to be cooked or can be eaten raw. Option D is incorrect because there is a clear difference between foods that need to be cooked and those that can be eaten raw.

questions.question_text: Milk comes from cows.
questions.explanation_correct: Milk comes from cows. Cows are animals that give us milk, which is a dairy product. Milk is an important food that helps us grow strong and healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk does not come from plants. Milk is produced by animals, specifically cows. Cows have special glands called udders that make milk for their baby calves, and we can also get milk from cows to drink and use in our food.

questions.question_text: Rice is a fruit.
questions.explanation_correct: Rice is not a fruit. Fruits grow on trees or plants, and they have seeds. Rice is a type of grain that comes from a special grass plant.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice is not a fruit. Fruits like apples and oranges have seeds and grow on trees or plants. Rice is a type of grain that comes from a grass plant. Grains like rice, wheat, and corn are not fruits.

questions.question_text: We should eat different types of food.
questions.explanation_correct: Yes, we should eat different types of food because it keeps us healthy. Eating a variety of foods like fruits, vegetables, grains, and dairy products gives our body all the nutrients it needs to grow and be strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: No, that is not correct. We should eat different types of food every day to stay healthy. Eating only one or two types of food is not good for us. Our body needs different nutrients found in fruits, vegetables, grains, and other foods to function properly.

questions.question_text: Eggs come from hens.
questions.explanation_correct: Eggs do come from hens. Hens are female chickens, and they lay eggs that we can eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eggs do not come from other animals like cows or goats. Eggs are a special food that only hens can lay. Hens are the birds that give us eggs to eat.

questions.question_text: We can eat banana without cooking.
questions.explanation_correct: You are right, we can eat banana without cooking. Bananas are a type of fruit that we can eat raw, straight off the plant. They don't need to be cooked before we eat them.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Some foods like rice and potatoes need to be cooked before we can eat them. But fruits like bananas can be eaten raw, without any cooking. Bananas are soft and sweet, so we can just peel them and enjoy eating them right away.

questions.question_text: Carrot is a grain.
questions.explanation_correct: Carrot is not a grain. Carrots are vegetables that grow from the ground, not grains like rice or wheat that grow on plants.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carrot is a vegetable, not a grain. Grains are the small, hard seeds that grow on plants like rice, wheat, and corn. Carrots are a root vegetable that grow in the soil, not on a plant like grains do.

questions.question_text: Honey comes from bees.
questions.explanation_correct: Honey is made by bees. Bees collect nectar from flowers and turn it into honey, which is a sweet food that we can eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Honey does not come from plants. It is made by bees, who collect nectar from flowers and turn it into honey. Honey is a delicious food that we get from bees, not from plants.

questions.question_text: Junk food is very healthy.
questions.explanation_correct: Junk food is not very healthy. It has a lot of sugar, salt, and fat, which can be bad for your body if you eat it too much.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Junk food like chips, cookies, and soda are not good for your health. They have a lot of unhealthy ingredients that can make you feel tired and sick if you eat them a lot. Healthy foods like fruits, vegetables, and whole grains are much better for you and will help you grow strong and energetic.

questions.question_text: Dal needs to be cooked before eating.
questions.explanation_correct: Dal is a type of pulse, which needs to be cooked before eating. Cooking helps to make the dal soft and easy to digest.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Some foods like fruits and salads can be eaten raw, but dal is a type of pulse that needs to be cooked first. Cooking the dal makes it soft and removes any hard parts, so it's easier and safer for you to eat.

questions.question_text: Cheese is made from milk.
questions.explanation_correct: Cheese is made from milk, so the answer is true. Milk from cows, buffaloes, or other animals is used to make different types of cheese like cheddar, mozzarella, and paneer.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cheese is not made from fruits or vegetables. It is made by processing milk from animals like cows and buffaloes. So the statement 'Cheese is made from milk' is true.

questions.question_text: ___ comes from cows.
questions.explanation_correct: Milk comes from cows. Cows are animals, and animals like cows give us food like milk that we can drink and use to make other foods.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'Milk'. Milk does not come from plants, it comes from animals like cows. Cows are the animals that give us milk, which is a very important food for us to drink and use to make other foods like cheese and butter.

questions.question_text: Apple and banana are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Apple and banana are fruits because they grow on plants. Fruits are the sweet, fleshy parts of plants that contain seeds. We can eat fruits like apples and bananas raw without cooking them.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Apple and banana are not vegetables. Vegetables are parts of plants like leaves, stems, or roots that we can eat, like carrots and spinach. Fruits like apples and bananas grow on the plants, not under the ground like vegetables. The correct answer is 'fruits'.

questions.question_text: ___ gives us eggs.
questions.explanation_correct: Hens, which are female chickens, are the animals that give us eggs. Chickens lay eggs that we can collect and eat as food.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cows do not give us eggs, they give us milk. Eggs come from hens, which are the female chickens. The correct answer is 'hen' because hens are the animals that lay the eggs we eat.

questions.question_text: Carrot and spinach are ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Carrot and spinach are vegetables because they are plant-based foods that grow in the ground. Vegetables are an important part of a healthy diet and provide us with vitamins and minerals that keep our bodies strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carrot and spinach are not fruits, they are vegetables. Vegetables are plant-based foods that grow on plants, unlike fruits which grow on trees or vines. The correct answer is 'vegetables'.

questions.question_text: We should eat a ___ diet to stay healthy.
questions.explanation_correct: We should eat a balanced diet to stay healthy because it means eating different types of foods like fruits, vegetables, grains, dairy, and proteins. This gives our body all the nutrients it needs to grow strong and stay well.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'balanced'. A balanced diet means eating a variety of foods from different food groups, not just one type of food. Eating a balanced diet helps our body get all the nutrients it needs to be healthy and grow properly.

questions.question_text: ___ is a grain that we use to make roti.
questions.explanation_correct: Wheat is a type of grain that we use to make roti, a flatbread that is very popular in India. Roti is made by grinding wheat into flour and then cooking it on a hot pan or griddle.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'Wheat'. Wheat is the grain that we use to make roti, a flatbread that is very common in Indian cuisine. Other grains like rice or millet are not used to make roti. The accepted answer format is a single word: 'Wheat'.

questions.question_text: Foods we eat without cooking are called ___ food.
questions.explanation_correct: Foods we eat without cooking are called 'raw' food. This means the food has not been heated or cooked before we eat it. Examples of raw food are fruits, vegetables, and salads.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The accepted answer for this question is 'raw'. Some foods like fruits and vegetables are not cooked before we eat them. These are called 'raw' foods. Other foods like rice and vegetables need to be cooked before we can eat them.

questions.question_text: ___ comes from bees.
questions.explanation_correct: Honey comes from bees. Bees make honey from the nectar they collect from flowers. This sweet, sticky substance is food that bees store in their hives.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The answer is 'Honey'. Honey does not come from plants, it comes from bees. Bees collect nectar from flowers and turn it into honey, which they store in their hives. Honey is a type of food that we get from animals, not plants.

questions.question_text: Rice and dal are ___ before we eat them.
questions.explanation_correct: Rice and dal need to be cooked before we can eat them. This is because cooking helps make the food softer and easier to chew and digest. Cooking also kills any germs or bacteria in the food, making it safer for us to eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'cooked'. Rice and dal are not eaten raw. They need to be cooked, which means they are heated up and prepared, before we can eat them. Cooking the food makes it easier for our bodies to digest and get energy and nutrients from it.

questions.question_text: Dal is a ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Dal is a pulse because it comes from a plant. Pulses are a type of food that we get from plants, like chickpeas, lentils, and beans.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Dal is not a fruit, vegetable, grain, or dairy product. It is a type of pulse, which is a food that comes from plants. Pulses like dal are an important part of a balanced diet.

questions.question_text: Cheese, butter, and curd are ___ products.
questions.explanation_correct: Cheese, butter, and curd are dairy products because they come from milk, which is produced by animals like cows and buffaloes. Dairy products are an important part of a healthy diet as they provide us with calcium and other nutrients.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Cheese, butter, and curd are not grains, vegetables, or fruits. They are dairy products, which means they come from the milk of animals like cows and buffaloes. The correct answer is 'dairy'.

questions.question_text: We get food from ___ and animals.
questions.explanation_correct: We get food from plants because plants give us fruits, vegetables, grains, and pulses. Plants are one of the main sources of the food we eat every day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The answer is plants, not animals. Plants like fruits, vegetables, grains, and pulses are one of the two main sources we get our food from. The other main source is animals, which give us milk, eggs, meat, and honey. So we get food from both plants and animals, but the correct answer here is plants.

questions.question_text: Arrange: First fruits, then vegetables
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is Apple, Banana, Spinach, Carrot. This is because fruits like apples and bananas come before vegetables like spinach and carrots in the list of food items.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be Spinach, Carrot, Apple, Banana. This is wrong because fruits like apples and bananas should come before vegetables like spinach and carrots. Fruits are different from vegetables, so they should be listed separately.

questions.question_text: Arrange: First plant foods, then animal foods
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is Rice, Banana, Milk, Egg. This is because rice and banana are plant-based foods, while milk and egg are animal-based foods. We need to arrange the foods in this order to show that we get food from both plants and animals.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be Milk, Egg, Rice, Banana. This is wrong because milk and egg are animal-based foods, while rice and banana are plant-based foods. We need to arrange the plant-based foods first, followed by the animal-based foods.

questions.question_text: Arrange: First raw foods, then cooked foods
questions.explanation_correct: The answer is correct because apples and grapes are raw foods that we can eat without cooking, while rice and dal need to be cooked before we can eat them. Arranging the items in this order - raw foods first, then cooked foods - is the right way to group them.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The answer is not correct because rice and dal are cooked foods, not raw foods. Rice and dal need to be cooked before we can eat them, while apples and grapes can be eaten raw without cooking. The correct order should be: Apple, Grapes, Rice, Dal.

questions.question_text: Arrange meals in order of the day:
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order of meals in a day is Breakfast, Lunch, and then Dinner. This is because we start our day with Breakfast, then have Lunch in the middle of the day, and end with Dinner at night. This is the usual order in which we eat our meals throughout the day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be Dinner, Breakfast, Lunch. This is not right because we always start our day with Breakfast, then have Lunch in the middle of the day, and finally end with Dinner at night. The correct order is Breakfast, Lunch, and then Dinner.

questions.question_text: Arrange: How milk becomes butter
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is: Cow gives milk, Cream is collected, Cream is churned, Butter is ready. This is the correct process because the cow first gives milk, then the cream (the thicker part of the milk) is collected, the cream is churned (mixed rapidly) to make butter, and finally the butter is ready to eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be: Butter is ready, Cow gives milk, Cream is collected, Cream is churned. This is wrong because butter cannot be ready before the cow gives milk, the cream is collected from the milk, and the cream is churned to make the butter. The steps must go in the correct order for the butter to be made properly.
